fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

The user specified ID of the Nature of Action reference. If this field left blank, the system will generate a Nature of Action ID for a newly created Nature of Action. This field can be used in lieu of the Nature of Action reference to determine which Nature of Action to update.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Code for the Nature of Action reference. This field is required when adding a new Nature of Action. When updating, the code must be compatible with the existing or passed in NOA Series reference.
Explanation for the Nature of Action reference. This field is required when adding a new Nature of Action. When updating, the Explanation must be compatible with the Parameters' names and types.
Don't Require Legal Authority and Remark boolean for the Nature of Action reference
Inactive boolean for the Nature of Action reference

Code.description: Code for the Nature of Action reference. This field is required when adding a new Nature of Action. When updating, the code must be compatible with the existing or passed in NOA Series reference.

Don_t_Require_Legal_Authority_and_Remark.description: Don't Require Legal Authority and Remark boolean for the Nature of Action reference

Explanation.description: Explanation for the Nature of Action reference. This field is required when adding a new Nature of Action. When updating, the Explanation must be compatible with the Parameters' names and types.

ID.description: The user specified ID of the Nature of Action reference. If this field left blank, the system will generate a Nature of Action ID for a newly created Nature of Action. This field can be used in lieu of the Nature of Action reference to determine which Nature of Action to update.

Inactive.description: Inactive boolean for the Nature of Action reference
